field_label: CURRENTLY is your psoriasis:
Over the last week, how itchy, sore, painful or stinging has your skin been?
Over the last week, how embarrassed or self-conscious have you been because of your skin?
Over the last week, how much has your skin interfered with you going shopping or looking after your home or garden?
Over the last week, how much has your skin influenced the clothes you wear?
Over the last week, how much has your skin affected any social or leisure activities?
Over the last week, how much has your skin made it difficult for you to do any sport?
Over the last week, has your skin prevented you from working or studying?
Over the last week how much has your skin been a problem at work or studying?
Over the last week, how much has your skin created problems with your partner or any of your close friends or relatives?
Over the last week, how much has your skin caused any sexual difficulties?
Over the last week, how much of a problem has the treatment for your skin been, for example by making your home messy, or by taking up time?
dlqi_calc
calculation_fn: const sum = (+blpso_dlqi1 > 4 ? 4 : +blpso_dlqi1) +(+blpso_dlqi2 > 4 ? 4 : +blpso_dlqi2) +(+blpso_dlqi3 > 4 ? 4 : +blpso_dlqi3) +(+blpso_dlqi4 > 4 ? 4 : +blpso_dlqi4) +(+blpso_dlqi5 > 4 ? 4 : +blpso_dlqi5) +(+blpso_dlqi6 > 4 ? 4 : +blpso_dlqi6) +(+blpso_dlqi7a ? (+blpso_dlqi7a > 4 ? 4 : +blpso_dlqi7a) : 4) +(+blpso_dlqi8 > 4 ? 4 : +blpso_dlqi8) +(+blpso_dlqi9 > 4 ? 4 : +blpso_dlqi9) +(+blpso_dlqi10 > 4 ? 4 : +blpso_dlqi10);console.log('***** = ', sum);const res = 40 - sum;console.log('***** = ', res<0 ? 0 : res);return res<0 ? 0 : res;

Acceptability of genetic testing

Your blood sample is helping us investigate whether people's genes affect how they respond to different treatment strategies. In the future, this information may help us to better tailor different strategies according to a person's 'genetic makeup'. We will only look at genes related to psoriasis and other inflammatory disease research (e.g. arthritis, inflammatory bowel disease). Please answer the following questions about how you feel about providing this blood sample to look at your genes.
Do you like or dislike providing a blood sample to look at your genes?
How much effort is it to provide a blood sample to look at your genes?
How fair is it (to people with psoriasis) for you to provide a blood sample to look at your genes?
How confident are you that you can provide a blood sample to look at your genes?
Providing a blood sample to look at my genes could help improve my health
It is clear to me how providing a blood sample to look at my genes might improve my health
Providing a blood sample to look at my genes will interfere with my other priorities
How acceptable to you is providing a blood test to look at your genes?
